title: Marketplace Roundtable #80: Dividend Investing In The COVID-19 Market
description: We talk with three Marketplace authors about how they are addressing dividend stocks and strategies in the current market. Limelight Alpha Management Partners, author of Top Stocks for Tomorrow, speaks from 1:00-22:15 minute mark; Tariq Dennison, author of Long Run Income, joins us from 22:15-56:15; and The Dividend Guy, author of Dividend Growth Rocks, joins us from 56:15-1:21:15.
itunes:title: Dividend Investing In The COVID-19 Market
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We talk with three Marketplace authors about how they are addressing dividend stocks and strategies in the current market.
